definition: tall annual herb or subshrub of tropical Asia having velvety leaves and yellow flowers and yielding a strong fiber
details:
noun
- tall annual herb or subshrub of tropical Asia having velvety leaves and yellow flowers and yielding a strong fiber
= synonyms: velvetleaf
- arborescent perennial shrub having palmately lobed furry leaves and showy red-purple flowers
= synonyms: tree mallow, velvetleaf
